ygData.subject: RE: weapon choices at 17th level (was: taking the gho ulbane plunge)
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree wholeheartedly with my stout brother Perry.  The blackened iron bastard sword is an outstanding weapon.  I could easily see myself using it for a great
ygData.messageBody:
I agree wholeheartedly with my stout brother Perry. The blackened iron
bastard sword is an outstanding weapon. I could easily see myself using it
for a great many levels to come. Prior to that (from 21st to 25th level) I
used the shiny brass halberd because the -8 agility caused by the bone
bladed claymore really did seem to make a big difference to my staying power
in a fight. I did become fatigued much more quickly when wielding the
halberd, but I would rather be tired and alive than clumsy and dead ; )

Peace favor your sword,

Jarad Argentedge
27th level Paladin of Tunare
Blue Rose Order
Povar

*********************************************************************

From: "Paul Duquette" <PDuquette@...>

My BIBS has served me extremely well since 20th lvl. You might want
to go to
runnyeye and get one fer yourself.

Perry 29th dwarven Pally.
